userGuideDialog.title: {{appName}} User Guide
userGuideDialog.description: Learn how to make the most of your focus sessions with {{appName}}.

introduction.title: Introduction to {{appName}} & Pomodoro
introduction.content: {{appName}} is a timer app designed to help you enhance focus and productivity using the Pomodoro Technique, with AI-powered session analysis and customizable features.\nThe Pomodoro Technique breaks work into intervals (Pomodoros), typically 25 minutes, separated by short breaks. After a set number of Pomodoros (usually 4), you take a longer break. Benefits include improved focus, reduced burnout, and better time management.

pwa.title: Progressive Web App (PWA)
pwa.content: {{appName}} is a PWA, meaning you can install it on your device for an app-like experience and access some features offline. Look for an 'Install' or 'Add to Home Screen' option in your browser's menu when using {{appName}}.

authentication.title: User Accounts & Authentication
authentication.content:
Create an account or log in to save your session data (tasks, notes, dictionary, history) to the cloud (Firebase Firestore).
* Registration: Create a new account with your email and password. Your name is optional.
* Login: Sign in to access your saved data.
* Logout: Use the logout button in the header to sign out.
* Forgot Password: If you forget your password, use the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page to receive a reset link via email.

timerControls.title: Timer Controls
timerControls.content:
Use these controls to manage your session:
* Start/Pause: Click the main button to start or pause the current timer (Work, Short Break, or Long Break).
* Skip: Click the skip button (icon with arrow pointing right) to end the current interval and move to the next one.
* Reset: Click the reset button (circular arrow icon) to reset the current interval to its full duration and pause the timer.
* Mute/Unmute: Toggle soundscapes on or off using the volume icon.

collapsibleCards.title: Collapsible Sections (Tasks, Dictionary, Notes)
collapsibleCards.content: The 'Today's Tasks', 'Session Dictionary', and 'Session Notes & Context' sections below the timer are collapsible. Click on their titles (which include icons like ListChecks, BookMarked, FileText) to expand or hide them, helping you manage your workspace view.

dailyDataStorage.title: Daily Data Storage (Firebase Firestore)
dailyDataStorage.content: Your tasks, session notes, dictionary entries, session context, and session history (Pomodoro logs) are automatically saved to Firebase Firestore on a per-day basis, associated with your user account.\nThis means when a new day begins, these sections will appear empty, ready for the new day's activities. Your data from previous days remains stored and accessible.

tasks.title: Today's Tasks & Reminders
tasks.content:
In the 'Today's Tasks' card:
* Add tasks you want to accomplish for the current day. You can optionally set a reminder time (HH:mm) for each task using the time input.
* If a reminder time is set and browser notifications are permitted for this site, an in-app alert dialog will pop up when that time arrives. For this to work effectively, ensure you have allowed notifications for this site in your browser settings.
* Mark tasks as complete using the checkboxes. The reminder status (e.g., 'Reminder sent') will also be shown.
* Remove individual tasks with the trash icon.
* Clear all completed tasks with the button at the bottom (if any are completed).
Tasks (including reminder times) are saved to Firestore for the current day.

sessionNotesContext.title: Session Notes & Context (Main Page)
sessionNotesContext.content:
On the main timer page, in the 'Session Notes & Context' card:
* Use the textarea to jot down thoughts or ideas during your Pomodoro session.
* Select a 'Session Context' (General, Work Focus, Learning Focus) from the dropdown. This context helps the AI provide more tailored feedback if you use the AI Analysis feature on the main page.
* Your notes and selected context are saved to Firestore for the current day.
* AI-generated summaries (from the main page's AI analysis) can be appended to these notes.

notebookPage.title: Notebook Page (Markdown Editor)
notebookPage.content:
Navigate to the 'Notebook' page (Notebook icon ð in the header) for a more dedicated note-taking space.
* This page features a Markdown editor with 'Edit' and 'Preview' modes. Write your notes in Markdown syntax in 'Edit' mode and see the formatted output in 'Preview' mode.
* Use the integrated 'AI Generate' button (Wand icon ðª) to open a dialog. Enter a prompt, and the AI will generate text for you. You can then copy this text or insert it directly into your Markdown notes.
* All notes written on the Notebook page are saved to a separate 'generalNotebook' document in Firebase Firestore (not per-day). This is for longer-form, general notes, separate from your daily session notes.

viewingPastNotes.title: Viewing & Deleting Past Daily Session Notes
viewingPastNotes.content:
On the main timer page, within the 'Session Notes & Context' card, you can expand the 'View Past Notes' section (it's collapsible!).
* Use the calendar to select a previous date.
* The daily session notes (including any AI summaries saved on that day) for the selected date will be fetched from Firestore and displayed in a read-only area.
* A 'Delete Notes for [Date]' button allows you to remove the daily session notes for the selected past day from Firestore after confirmation. This does NOT affect notes on the dedicated Notebook page.

dictionaryCard.title: Session Dictionary (Main Page)
dictionaryCard.content:
The 'Session Dictionary' card on the main timer page allows you to get AI-powered definitions for words:
* Enter a word and click 'Define'. The AI (Gemini) will provide definitions in both English and Indonesian.
* Defined words and their definitions are stored for the current day in Firestore. Each entry can be individually deleted using the trash icon.
* All definitions for the current day can be exported to a Markdown (.md) file.

aiAnalysis.title: AI Session Analysis (Main Page)
aiAnalysis.content: {{appName}} features an AI-powered session analyzer (Genkit with Gemini). On the main timer page, click the Sparkles icon (â¨) in the header or the "Analyze Data" button in the notes section.\nThe AI will review your completed intervals (if any), tasks, and daily session notes, along with the selected Session Context.\nIt provides a summary and actionable suggestions. This summary can be saved to your daily session notes for the current day.

chatWidget.title: AI Chat Assistant
chatWidget.content: Need quick help or a productivity tip? Click the chat icon in the bottom right corner to talk to our AI assistant (powered by Gemini via Genkit).\nIt can answer questions about using {{appName}}, the Pomodoro Technique, or general focus strategies.

sessionHistory.title: Today's Session History (Pomodoro Log - Main Page)
sessionHistory.content: Click the history icon (ð) in the header to view a log of your completed Pomodoro intervals (Work, Short Break, Long Break) for the current day. This data is fetched from Firestore.\nYou can also clear today's history from this drawer.

viewPastDataPage.title: Viewing All Past Daily Data (Dedicated Page)
viewPastDataPage.content: Click the calendar icon (ðï¸) in the header to navigate to the 'View Past Session Data' page.\nHere, you can select any past date and view a comprehensive summary of all your recorded daily data for that day from Firestore, including tasks, daily session notes, session context, and dictionary entries. This does NOT show content from the separate Notebook page.

settings.title: Settings (Customization)
settings.content:
Click the gear icon (âï¸) in the header to open Settings. The settings are organized into tabs:
* Timer: Customize lengths for Work, Short Break, and Long Break intervals. Set the Long Break Interval (number of work sessions before a long break). Toggle auto-start for breaks and Pomodoros. Enable/disable browser notifications for interval ends and task reminders.
* Sound: Choose soundscapes for work and break periods. Adjust master volume. Upload your own custom soundscapes from local files (stored in your browser's IndexedDB).
* Appearance: Select visual background animations. Enable/disable a particle effect that follows your mouse. Toggle the initial guided tour on/off.

customSoundscapes.title: Custom Soundscapes (Settings - Sound Tab)
customSoundscapes.content: In the 'Sound' tab of Settings, you can upload your own audio files (e.g., MP3, WAV, OGG, max 10MB) to use as custom soundscapes.\nThese files are stored locally in your browser's IndexedDB, not on a server. You can select them in the 'Work Soundscape' and 'Break Soundscape' dropdowns and delete them if no longer needed (provided they are not currently selected).

themeAndAppearance.title: Theme & Visuals
themeAndAppearance.content: * Dark/Light Mode: Toggle between dark and light themes using the sun/moon icon in the header.\n* Background Effects: Choose various animated backgrounds or a simple gradient in the Settings menu (Appearance tab) to personalize your focus environment.

interactiveTourDialog.welcomeContent: {{appName}} is a Pomodoro timer designed to boost your focus and productivity. This quick tour will show you around.
interactiveTourDialog.timerContent: This is your main countdown timer. It switches between Work, Short Break, and Long Break modes automatically or manually.
interactiveTourDialog.timerControlsContent: Use these buttons to Start/Pause, Skip to the next interval, Reset the current interval, or Mute/Unmute sounds.
interactiveTourDialog.pomodoroDotsContent: These dots track your progress through a Pomodoro cycle. A full cycle (usually 4 work sessions) earns you a Long Break.
interactiveTourDialog.collapsibleCardsContent: The sections for Tasks, Dictionary, and Session Notes below the timer on the main page can be expanded or collapsed by clicking their titles.
interactiveTourDialog.tasksContent: Add your to-dos here for the current day. Mark them complete as you go. Tasks are saved per day to your Firebase database.
interactiveTourDialog.taskRemindersContent: You can set an optional reminder time (HH:mm) for each task. You'll get an in-app alert dialog when it's time for that task if notifications are allowed!
interactiveTourDialog.notesContent: Jot down thoughts during your Pomodoro sessions. Select a 'Session Context' (Work, Learning, General) to help the AI give more relevant feedback. These notes and context are saved per day to Firebase.
interactiveTourDialog.aiNoteGeneratorContent: On the dedicated 'Notebook' page, click the 'AI Generate' (Wand icon ðª) button. Enter a prompt, and the AI will generate text that you can then insert into your general notes.
interactiveTourDialog.aiAnalysisContent: After a session or when you have notes/tasks, click the Sparkles icon (â¨) in the header or 'Analyze Data' button (on the main page) to get an AI summary and improvement tips for your daily session. You can save this summary to your daily notes.
interactiveTourDialog.chatWidgetContent: Click the chat icon in the bottom right to talk to an AI assistant (Gemini) for quick questions or support related to your focus session.
interactiveTourDialog.dictionaryCardContent: Define words in English and Indonesian. Your daily session's definitions are saved to Firebase, can be exported to Markdown, and individual entries can be deleted.
interactiveTourDialog.notebookPageContent: Access the Notebook page (ð icon in header) for general, long-form notes using a Markdown editor with Edit/Preview modes. These notes are saved separately in Firebase (not per-day).
interactiveTourDialog.viewingPastNotesContent: In the 'Session Notes & Context' card on the main page, expand 'View Past Notes' to pick a date and see daily session notes from that day. You can also delete notes for a viewed past day.
interactiveTourDialog.viewPastDataTitle: View Past Daily Data (Header Calendar Icon)
interactiveTourDialog.viewPastDataContent: Click the calendar icon in the header to go to a page where you can view all your saved daily tasks, session notes, context, and dictionary entries for any past date from Firebase.
interactiveTourDialog.headerToolsContent: Access AI Summary (â¨), Today's Session History (ð), User Guide (ð), Settings (âï¸), Theme Toggle (âï¸/ð), Language Switcher (ð), Notebook (ð), and View Past Data (ðï¸) from the header.
interactiveTourDialog.settingsContent: Customize timer durations, auto-start behavior, sounds (including uploading your own!), background animations, and more to fit your workflow. Settings are organized into tabs.
interactiveTourDialog.allSetContent: You've learned the basics of {{appName}}. Time to start your first focus session!

notifications.permissionDeniedDescription: Task reminders and timer alerts will not be shown. Please enable notification permissions for this site in your browser settings for {{appName}}.
notifications.permissionRequestDescription: {{appName}} needs permission to show task reminders and timer alerts. Please check your browser for a permission prompt.
